details:
adjective
- strong and sure
= synonyms: firm
- freshly made or left
= synonyms: warm
- being distilled rather than fermented
= synonyms: hard
- not faint or feeble
= example: not faint or feeble
- having a strong physiological or chemical effect
= synonyms: stiff
- having or wielding force or authority
= synonyms: potent
- of verbs not having standard (or regular) inflection
= example: of verbs not having standard (or regular) inflection
- of good quality and condition
= synonyms: solid
- having strength or power greater than average or expected
= example: having strength or power greater than average or expected
- immune to attack
= synonyms: inviolable
